author: Ryan Maskewitz

ownerResponse.text: Ryan! Thank you for the kind words Glad you and the fam are already enjoying what and why you moved to Bellingham for!

author: Jimmy Balch
review: Galen was such a great agent to work with. His honest and realistic point of view was appreciated especially because it was backed by historical industry knowledge. He was good about listening to our wants, needs and nice-to-haves and was

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Jim! So glad we could find you and Lisa such a great house:)

author: in293yew
review: In my past experiences with buying and selling a home, I felt that my realtors held all the cards and I was simply a pawn being manipulated through the unfamiliar process.  So I was grateful that Rom Hirss was  respectful, patient, and sincere throughout.  I would recommend him to friends and family without any reservation.

ownerResponse.text:
Hey Raymond,
Thanks for the high praises and Im glad we were able to help in a way that made you the most comfortable.  More

author: Jordan Gaphni

author: Tamira Vojnar

author: Jonathan Strahl
review: Galen and Rom are legitimately the best people to work with! Both times I have worked with them I felt that I was receiving real value from having an agent. They know the market well, and they go the extra mile to understand client needs,

author: Holli Kaplan
review: Can't say enough great things about Rom and Galen who helped us with more than one Bellingham home purchase over the years. Excellent responsiveness and availability, thoughtful attention to our needs, direct and honest opinions, superior

author: Mary Kratovil

author: D Webb
review: Rom at Bellingham Partners has helped us tremendously with finding just the right place to live. Weve relied on his expertise and creativity to purchase homes to live in as well as rental homes. He knows the area very well and is able to

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Dawn! We love working with you and your fam. Cheers

author: Becky G
review: We just made a move from Colorado to Bellingham. In the process we worked with 2 realtors in Colorado and Rom and Galen in Bellingham. Rom and Galen were by far the most responsive, patient and knowledgeable! They heard our needs (from a

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Becky! So glad you and the fam love Bellingham and your new home:) It was our pleasure to help you guys.

author: Anna McElroy
review: Rom and Galen were an absolute pleasure to work with during my homebuying process. They were patient and incredibly helpful in navigating a crazy market as a first time homebuyer. Their expertise in realty and personal experience of being homeowners in the area made them a trusted advisor throughout the process.

author: Rosalie Stephens
review: Rom was fantastic to work with. Being new to the area, he was invaluable in helping us figure out where we would like to settle. He responded quickly to our emails and texts, was readily available to show properties when needed, and was

author: Leslie Siebring
review: This was my first home buying experience and Rom made sure I understood what was happening every step of the way. He was really prompt, knowledgeable, and helpful answering my questions. I appreciated that he kept my goals in mind when

author: Kris Volpenhein
review: Rom and Galen offer an excellent combination of market knowledge, advice without pressure, alternative perspectives to consider and knowing when its time to act. They are willing to take the long and patient route but also supportive if an

author: Zack Garza
review: Galen assisted me in buying my first home. I was very impressed by his professionalism and enthusiasm during the process. My home search lasted over two years. Galen met with me at my convince at all days and times of the week. About 6

author: Jonathan Cicotti
review: I recommend working with Rom 100%! Whether you are looking for your dream home or investment property he will walk you through the process to help you make the best decision that works for you.

author: Riley Myers
review: Rom was amazing to work with! It was super easy to communicate and keep up to date with him (call/text/email). He always answered my questions and in the end he helped me get the best deal possible. An awesome guy, highly recommended.

author: Luke Kaemingk
review: Rom was awesome. He found me a great investment property and walked me through everything. I am very happy and would recommend him (in fact, I have)! Very easy to work with, knowledgeable about the process and construction in general, and a great guy.

author: Devin Calhoun
review: Galen is personable, professional, and knowledgeable.  Great to work with and knows this area and market very well.  Perfect balance of hands on supportive guidance, and proactive footwork to ease the whole process.

author: Charles Brinson
review: The highest praise for Galen! From our first communications to after closing, Galen is personable and professional. I would highly recommend him to anyone. Charles

author: Brooks Friedland
review: Exceptional realtors.
